snippet: Jody Sanford Sweeney, the associate director of college counseling at William Penn Charter School, advises that "researching schools can be considered another extracurricular activity" for juniors.
abstract: Jody Sanford Sweeney, the associate director of college counseling at William Penn Charter School, advises that "researching schools can be considered another extracurricular activity" for juniors.

headline.main: Counselor's Calendar | September Checklist for Juniors
